modName: Neo Oriental Dress v1_20 CBBE UNP
summary: Add New Dresses and Armours from Far Eastern.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]Neo's Oriental Dress[/color][/b]

Author : Neovinci aka Meister

=================================

Add New Dresses and Armours from Far Eastern.

This mod has some Clothing, Chinese Qipao.

[youtube]Mse6qgshmlE[/youtube]
(youtube by mrkrossfaith. Thank you.)


It is first of my Far Eastern Clothing Plan.


- Clothing and Light Armours.

- All Female Items.

- Craft and Temperable. You can check it in Leathery tab-at every Forges.

- Leather Material

===============================================================

[b][color=yellow]Current Version : v1.20[/color][/b]

[b]2 New Clothing, several fair of Gloves and Shoes added.[/b]

===============================================================

There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

If you mix it with other mod's Outfits, some part will disappear.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)


Have a good time.



=================================

[b][color=yellow]Locaton :[/color][/b] In a container, near by fallen tree, Riverwood.(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body(for CBBE version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
[b][color=yellow]Recommend :[/color][/b] CBBEv3M Body Repalacer by MAK07 ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13180 )

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 for UNP version ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709 )

========================================================================================

======================================================================================

[b]You can do whatever with it for personal usage.
It's not free for other's Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
If You want it, Send A PM or Mail to Me.[/b]
author: Neovinci aka Meister
